subtitle: A one pot meal - just serve with salad.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Fry the sausages for 8-10 min until evenly browned. Remove from pan. Set aside.
Place rice, cider turmeric and chilli powder in a large saucepan. Bring to the boil and simmer for 10 min, stirring occasionally.
Stir the peas and mushrooms into the pan. Cook for 5 min or until liquid is nearly absorbed.
Meanwhile, slice the sausages thickly. Slice the kabanos into similar-sized pieces.
Add the sausages and kabanos to the pan with the herbs and seasoning. Toss together over a low heat for 2-3 min. Serve.

title: Spicy sausage rice
